{
  "name": "gulp-npm-dist",
  "version": "1.0.4",
  "description": "A Gulp plugin for listing package.json dependencies and copying their minified (dist) files to a specific folder.",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "gulp-npm-dist",
    "copy libs",
    "copy dist",
    "copy main files",
    "copy dependencies",
    "gulp",
    "npm"
  ],
  "repository": "dshemendiuk/gulp-npm-dist",
  "author": {
    "name": "Dima Shemendiuk",
    "email": "dshemendiuk@gmail.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/dshemendiuk"
  },
  "license": "MIT"
}
